ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a Python implementation of the MUVERA algorithm, which uses Fixed-Dimensional Encoding (FDE) to transform multiple vectors into a single fixed-size vector. This allows for efficient similarity searches in large datasets where documents are represented by multiple vectors, preserving the relationships between them.
